item.title: Advanced Hugo Blog Configuration Guide
item.description:
Advanced Hugo Blog Configuration Guide

This is an English version of the advanced configuration guide for Hugo blogs. The content helps users configure their Hugo blog with advanced settings.

Note: This is a placeholder for translation. The complete translation will be added later.

Basic Configuration

If you want to configure your Hugo blog with advanced settings, you need to modify the config.toml or hugo.toml file.

Theme Configuration

Hugo themes provide various customization options. You can modify them according to your needs.
